ti:edition.ti:label: De Opificio Mundi
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera que supersunt, Volume 1. Berlin: Reimer, 1896.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Opificio Mundi
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE THE ACCOUNT OF ON OF THE WORLD, THE CREATION AS GIVEN BY MOSES," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
